name: C0untd0wn: The Dem0
description:
C0untd0wn: The Dem0 is a text-based, science fiction survival-horror game where you play as Hugo, a frightened 12 year old boy who is trapped on a spaceship alone, with the malevolent entity that hunts him.

This game is merely a small part of a larger narrative, and is still a work in progress.

C0untd0wn: The Dem0 was written and coded by Kimba Rose Williams.
